33414.扉は かたく 閉ざされている。: The door is locked up tight.

33415.<center>この世界で 平和に 暮らしていた\nすべての 生きとし生ける者は:
All living things that have lived peacefully in this world are in danger of extinction. Two suns are rising in the sky. Since the
appearance of the second sun, this world has become a hell. The second sun, the one that is now awakening, runs freely across the sky,
scorches the earth, dries up the seas, and lures people into searing despair. We do not know why the sun became two. All we know is
that all who live on earth are about to perish.

33416.<center>『風の民 エルフ』\n自然を愛し 森と共に生きる\n背に小さな羽:
Elves, the ''People of Wind'', are a group of lovely people with small wings on their backs who love nature and live together with the
forests. They respect tradition and prestige, have learned the truth of the world deeply, and have sent many excellent spell users into
the world.

33417.<center>『炎の民 オーガ』\n厳しい荒野で チカラ強く生きる\n大きな身:
Ogres, the ''People of Flame'': A large body with horns and tails who live strongly in the harsh wilderness. Belligerent and respectful
of the strong, they risked their lives to fight for the weak and the companion with their outstanding strength and stamina.

33418.<center>『地の民 ドワーフ』\n雄大な山々に恩恵を受け 大地と共に生きる:
Dwarves, the ''People of Earth'', are a small-bodied people with large ears who live together with the earth and are blessed by the majestic mountains.
With their high technology and strong desires, they have built several advanced civilizations with their natural dexterity and speed.

33419.<center>『水の民 ウェディ』\n海に浮かぶ美しい島々で 自由に生きる\n:
Weddies, the ''People of Water'', are a group of people with bodies the color of blue water who live freely on beautiful islands in the
sea. They hate constraints and cherish songs and love, and only fight to protect their loved ones by using their speed and strength.

33420.<center>『花の民 プクリポ』\n絵本のような色彩の町で 楽しさを求めて生:
Pukulipos, the ''People of Flowers'' In a town of picture-book colors, these lovely, fluffy little creatures live in search of fun. Born
with strong magical powers and dexterity, they are more passionate about creating fun than fighting and creating things.

33421.<center>『勇の民 人間』\nどんな地でも 生きていける\n大きくもなく:
Humans, the ''People of Valor'', are neither large nor small, and can survive in any land. They were thought to be without
merit, but when faced with danger, they had the courage to face it without being crushed.

33422.<center>『空の民 竜族』\nはるか かなたより\n世界を見守る 聖なる者:
Draconians, the ''People of Sky'', are the holy ones who watch over the world from afar. They are said to have flown down to the
earth when there was strife and brought peace to the world in an instant with their great power.
